biotools.summary: Python library that provides a comprehensive and customized set of Gene Ontology (GO) based functional analysis tools that exploit the biological knowledge that GO offers in describing genes or groups of genes through the use of GO semantic similarity measures for biological knowledge discovery.

bioschemas.name: A-DaGO-Fun
bioschemas.summary: Python library that provides a comprehensive and customized set of Gene Ontology (GO) based functional analysis tools that exploit the biological knowledge that GO offers in describing genes or groups of genes through the use of GO semantic similarity measures for biological knowledge discovery.
